    Elevating Retail Experience at Avantra by Trends

    Discover how EON Elevators addressed the complex vertical mobility challenge at a high-profile retail center, collaborating closely with the developer to integrate high-capacity passenger and service elevators. Through a precise, engineering-first methodologyâ€”including in-depth traffic flow analysis and a focus on design aestheticsâ€”EON provided an innovative solution that perfectly balanced superior functionality, enduring low maintenance, and commercial clarity.

    Challenges
    Requirement for high-capacity passenger elevators and service elevators to support customer convenience and operational efficiency at a premium multi-floor retail destination.
    Problem Statement

    The retail-centric project had unique requirements:

    • Passenger Elevators: High-capacity and high-speed elevators to handle continuous customer traffic.
    • Service Elevators: Heavy-duty solutions for stock movement, deliveries, and operations.
    • Service Elevators: Heavy-duty solutions for stock movement, deliveries, and operations.
    • Reliability: Systems needed to ensure zero downtime during peak shopping hours.
    • Cost Efficiency: Commercials had to be competitive without compromising on safety or quality.
    • Technical Fitment: Space optimization was critical within retail layouts with high customer density.
    Approach / Solution

    EON Elevators responded with a retail-optimized, engineering-first approach:

    • Traffic Flow & Usage Study â€“ Analyzed customer footfall patterns and backend logistics requirements.
    • Tailored Elevator Designs â€“ Recommended high-speed passenger elevators and heavy-duty service lifts with optimized capacities.
    • Design Integration â€“ Ensured finishes, cabins, and interfaces matched the premium interiors of Avantra.
    • Competitive Commercials â€“ Structured cost packages aligned with project budgets while maintaining international standards.
    • Onsite Technical Expertise â€“ Engineers coordinated with architects and contractors to ensure smooth fitment in retail spaces.

    Insights & Lessons

  • Retail projects require a dual-focus on customer experience and backend logistics.
  • Traffic flow analysis is critical for sizing elevators in commercial spaces
  • Design alignment adds to the brand experience in lifestyle and fashion retail environments.
  • Structured processes and transparency strengthen trust in large-scale retail partnerships.

    • Implementation Journey

    Phase 1: Requirement Study & Survey

    In-depth traffic and usage analysis across customer and service areas.

    Phase 2: Proposal & Design Submission

    Right-sized elevator solutions tailored for both shoppers and operations.

    Phase 3: Commercial Finalization

    Clear, transparent pricing and technical specifications built client trust.

    Phase 4: Execution & Fitment Support

    Close onsite supervision ensured precise installation within tight retail timelines.

    Outcomes
  • Technical Excellence: High-speed passenger elevators delivered seamless customer movement, while service elevators ensured backend efficiency.
  • Design Integration: Elevators enhanced the premium shopping ambiance of Avantra by Trends.
  • Operational Reliability: Durable systems with minimal maintenance ensured continuous uptime during peak hours.
  • Budget Fit: Solutions delivered within commercial expectations without quality compromise.
  • Client Trust: Reinforced Reliance Trendsâ€™ confidence in EONâ€™s structured, engineering-led approach.

    • Conclusion

    At Avantra by Trends, Jaynagara, EON Elevators successfully delivered a comprehensive mobility solution that elevated both customer convenience and operational efficiency. By combining engineering precision, premium design alignment, and commercial transparency, EON reinforced its position as a trusted partner for large-scale retail and lifestyle developments.
